    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    AuthController
    Handles user authentication processes such as signup and login.
    Budget
    Represents a budget with its associated details including time period, amount, and remaining balance.
    BudgetController
    Controller class for managing budget operations.
    BudgetDatabase
    Handles persistent storage and retrieval of budget data.
    BudgetMenuView
    Provides a console-based user interface for managing budgets.
    Expense
    Represents an expense made by a user.
    ExpenseController
    Controller class that manages operations related to user expenses.
    ExpenseDataBase
    A class that manages expense records stored in a file-based database.
    ExpenseMenuView
    A class responsible for providing a menu-based user interface to manage expenses for a logged-in user.
    Income
    Represents an income record with details about the income transaction.
    IncomeController
    Controller class for managing income-related operations.
    IncomeMenueView
    Provides a console-based user interface for managing income records.
    IncomeRepository
    Repository class for managing income data persistence.
    INotification
    Defines a contract for user notification functionality.
    IReminderNotification
    Extends the basic notification functionality to include reminder-specific operations.
    Main
    The main application class for the Personal Finance Management System.
    NotificationController
     
    Reminder
    Represents a reminder notification with its scheduling details and status.
    ReminderController
    Controller class for managing reminder operations.
    ReminderDataBase
    Handles persistent storage and retrieval of reminder data.
    ReminderMenuView
    Provides a console-based user interface for managing reminders.
    ReminderNotification
    Implementation of IReminderNotification that handles scheduled reminders and notifications.
    User
    Represents a user in the system with a username, password, email, and user ID.
    UserDatabase
    Provides operations for saving, searching, and updating users in a text file-based user database.
